Name: Love on Beach
About the game: John went for an internship at a shop on a tropical island, but it's more like a holiday. A bit different approach to Visual Novel with multiple dating events and endings. In this game you can: Hang out with the girls! Get lost on an island! Enjoy your vacations! Have fun on the beach! The game has about 2 hours of content (All character routes. Depending on your reading speed).
